name: pnp-list-formatting-content-navigator
title: Content Navigator
shortDescription: Demonstrates the use of the id attribute to create linkable anchors.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates the use of the id attribute to create linkable anchors. The list is intended to have 2 views (Content and Links) using the 2 view formats supplied. Each view can be added to a page as a separate list webpart. No connections are required. Clicking on an item in the links view webpart will navigate to the item in the content view webpart. Additionally, previous and next buttons are included in the content view for internal navigation.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
